name: d3-jsx
description: A d3.js module that adds JSX support

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && babel src -d build && rollup -c
scripts.rem-pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-foo.js -- index.js
scripts.rem-prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-foo.js -c -m -o build/d3-foo.min.js
scripts.rem0-postpublish: zip -j build/d3-foo.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-foo.js build/d3-foo.min.js
